19.5 me nisa pasugiya perahara pawathwima sandaha mudal hinga kama dala wisin sidu karana ladi, meya nishchithawama nithi wirodhi katayuththaki,(1980 anka 34 darana mahanuwara perahara bharaya panatha ullanghanaya kirimaki) me sambandhayen jathika sampath surakime wyaparaya nam sanwidhanayen allas ho dushana wimarshana komisamata paminili kara athimuth methek ee pilibanda piyawarak gath bawata thorathuru nomatha, mehi lajja sahagathama karanaya wanuye dala wisin aradhana kara maligawata genwa peraharata mudal dena lesa hinga ka athi wyapara saha sanwidhana athara anyagamika wyaparada wimayi.
